scripts.start: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && sudo apt-get install wget -y && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && sudo dpkg -i google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && sudo apt-get install -f -y && node index.js
scripts.build: apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y && apt-get install -y wget && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && dpkg -i google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && apt-get install -f -y && npm install
